DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy RT001 treat moderate severe lateral canthal line adult duration effect .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study RT001 Treat Moderate Severe Lateral Canthal Lines
DOC.detailed_description: This double-blind , randomize , parallel-group , control , dose-ranging , multi-center study evaluate safety efficacy RT001 compare placebo apply single , bilateral application least 180 subject moderate severe LCLs . Subjects randomize within site 1 3 treatment group 1:1:1 ratio . The safety efficacy two different dos RT001 , compare placebo , evaluate . At least 180 adult volunteer provide informed consent meet study eligibility criterion enrol . Subjects enrol two ( 2 ) sequential cohort . Cohort 1 consist 72 subject ; 24 subject per treatment group . Cohort 2 consist 108 subject ; 36 subject per treatment group . In order confirm safety test article , Cohort 2 enrol Cohort 1 subject reach Day 14 later Study Pause Criteria observe .
DOC.criteria: Female male , 30 60 year age Bilateral lateral canthal line rat moderate severe Willing refrain receive facial filler , laser treatment , use product affect skin remodel product may cause active dermal response treatment area begin Screening End Study Women childbearing potential must practice willing continue use effective method birth control course study Muscle weakness paralysis area receive study treatment Active skin disease irritation treatment area Undergone procedure may affect lateral canthal region past 12 month prior Screening Use topical steroid either treatment area use medication suppress immune system 30 day prior Screening continue End Study ( Day 28 ) Any abnormality electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Screening history clinically significant arrhythmia , unstable angina , myocardial infarction congestive heart failure . Previous treatment Botulinum Toxin Type A face area
